inventory=[{"type": "fishing_rod", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "sheep_spawn_egg", "quantity": 60, "index": 12}, {"type": "packed_ice", "quantity": 32, "index": 13}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 40, "index": 15}, {"type": "spruce_wood", "quantity": 60, "index": 16}, {"type": "snow_block", "quantity": 33, "index": 19}, {"type": "firework_star", "quantity": 7, "index": 20}, {"type": "skull_banner_pattern", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "cracked_polished_blackstone_bricks", "quantity": 41, "index": 23}, {"type": "glowstone", "quantity": 37, "index": 29}, {"type": "gold_ingot", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "iron_boots", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}, {"type": "farmland", "quantity": 37, "index": 41}, {"type": "lime_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 43}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone", "quantity": 47, "index": 44}, {"type": "flower_pot", "quantity": 39, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft golden_boots, I need to place gold ingots in the crafting grid in a T shape. I will start by placing one of the gold ingots from slot 35 in slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: golden_boots

thought: Next, I will place another gold ingot in slot 3, which is directly below slot 1.

act: move from slot 35 to slot 3 with quantity 1
